ORG.oclc.oai.server.crosswalk

Class Crosswalks

  • java.lang.Object
    • ORG.oclc.oai.server.crosswalk.Crosswalks

  • public class Crosswalks
extends java.lang.Object
    Crosswalks manages all the Crosswalk objects this repository supports.
    Author:
    Jeffrey A. Young

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Crosswalks(java.util.Map crosswalkItemMap) 
      Crosswalks(java.util.Properties properties)
      Find out which metadataFormats this repository supports and create the corresponding Crosswalk objects for each.
